Plus le jeu avance plus j'ai la sensation que ça devient pas du tout bien balancé.

Entre le fait qu'il est impossible de gagner en tueur en jouant face à des full team de tryhard (Et quand je dis impossible, c'est que même les meilleurs joueurs ne pourraient pas les battre, à l'exception de si on prend des tueurs qui changent la mécanique principale du jeu, comme la nurse, et encore...), entre le fait que jouer en survivant en solo = tomber avec des team mates absolument nuls qui vont être un handicap plutôt qu'une aide, entre le fait que le jeu soit bourré de cheaters intraçables... 

Bref, pour le moment, ces petits éléments gâchent complètement l'expérience de jeu. 

Le seul moyen de s'amuser est de jouer avec des amis forts en vocal sur discord, mais vu que tout le monde a compris que c'était le seul moyen d'avoir du fun, eh bien il faudra attendre une vingtaine de minutes avant de trouver une partie

C'est dommage, parce que je trouve à la base le jeu excellent, les développeurs ajoutent régulièrement du contenu, de nouvelles perks, de nouveaux tueurs et survivants, de nouvelles maps... etc. Mais malheureusement, le jeu n'est pas équilibré, malgré toutes les tentatives du studio.

Il manque pas grand chose au jeu, pour qu'il soit fun à jouer en toute circonstances, mais en l'état actuel, je ne recommande pas.

依稀记得刚开始玩这游戏的时候，紧张的不得了，害怕屠夫而在角落里瑟瑟发抖不敢去修电机。因为害怕而和朋友一起玩，开黑的时候分工明确，总是一边狂笑一边被屠夫追着跑。但现在挂壁满天飞，收集的东西说改就给你改没了，破坏手和有些技能现在显得很鸡肋。新屠夫永远越来越强。衣服变着花样出，但服务器依旧如初，还得用屠夫当服务器，有时卡到你心很累。游戏是好游戏，但得看开发商怎么去制作和改进。我觉得游戏是让人快乐的，我们是玩游戏而不是被游戏玩。曾经一起开黑的好友们没有再去碰这个游戏的了，只留下当初的欢笑在我脑海里久久不能停息，多希望日后游戏改进后还能在好友列表里看到       游戏中Dead by Daylight .......

散々動画で見続けて購入をしなかった勢が二月ほど前に購入
まず第一に否定的なレビューは基本無視していいです。お鯖様やらお鬼様がわんさか湧いてるんで。

サバイバー側はアプデにより弱くなったと思われがちだけど、それは個人プレーが多すて連携が取れてないだけです。
自分は絶対フレンドとは遊ばない！って人なら多少の弱体化を感じてもおかしくはない。けれど、実際の所PTを組んでのプレイをしている方が殆どなのでソレに合わせた調整と考えれば何も問題ありません。

キラー側でよく挙げられているマッチングのしにくさは始めたてならしょうがないです。
ランクが20～1まであり、20からスタートなので完全にはじめたてのプレイヤー同士としかマッチングしない様になっているので大人しくなにかして時間を潰しましょう。

いろんな否定的なレビューが多いですが、結局はそこまでDbDに対する思いがないだけなので気になったら購入しましょう！
ライトを拾ってキラーへ目掛けてチカチカして煽るもよし、目の前でしゃがみ連打で煽るもよしで楽しいことはいっぱいですよ！！僕は絶対許さないし、情けも掛けずにフェイスキャンプしてブロックリストに入れるけどな！！

Good game, with a decent dose of toxicity. This is to be expected though. At this point, it's people, not the game. This can be a really friendly game. Everyone says gg at the end and pays their respects to whoever did good, or they get salty and rage at the victor(s). That's the thing though, there's no true winner in this game. A few survivors can escape and the killer can still rank up, and a survivor can die and still rank up. There's one thing you need to remember if you play this. "You win some, you lose some". Just enjoy your time, rather than trying to be better than everyone else or justify why you died/didn't catch that survivor.

Eu resolvi mudar a minha revisão porque o jogo passou por varias mudanças e esta mais divertido agora. Ele passar por um sistema de rank então esta mais justo, pois vc joga com pessoas do seu rank. Mesmo assim, aconselho a jogar com os amigos, muito mais divertido assim. Mesmo jogando no seu rank ainda assim vc pode perder feio ou ganhar bonito, e isso vale para assassinos e sobreviventes. A unica coisa que eu não gosto são os assassinos campers, na minha opinião é a unica coisa que estraga o jogo. Mas quando o assassino sabe jogar bem ele consegue sim fazer uma partida legal mesmo se vc perder. Recomendo!

面白いけどオススメはしない、といった感じのゲーム。

簡単にルールを説明すると４人の生存者陣営と1人の殺人者陣営に分かれて戦う1プレイ10-20分ほどの非対称対戦です。生存者側は7台存在する発電機（フラグ）の内5つを直し、その後に2つ出現するゲートから脱出すれば勝ち。生存者は通常攻撃を2回受けるとダウンし、その後に所定の場所に吊るし上げられ、他生存者に救助されないまま一定時間経過すると死亡。殺人鬼は目安として3人以上殺害すれば勝ち、と。鬼ごっこの派生ゲーム「ケイドロ」とよく似たルールですね。

ここで言われる「トンネル」とは吊り救助された生存者を狙う事（同生存者は最大2回しか吊り救助出来ない）。「キャンプ」とは吊った生存者からあまり離れず救助を難航させる事。どちらも最初に吊った生存者を早期退場させる戦術です。そう、ただの戦術なんですよね。あわよくば全員退場を狙うゲームでチームの一角を集中攻撃して戦力を削ぎ落す。それの何がおかしいんですか？

このゲーム、特に生存者側の民度が低いです。ゲーム本体にはVC機能はないんですが（密な情報共有はバランスを著しく損なうから）、外部ツールのVCを利用した4人パーティによる野良キラー狩り、及び群れて気が大きくなった人間による煽りが横行しています。しかもそれを使う大義名分が「殺人者だってキャンプ・トンネルするだろ？」とか阿呆かと。他ゲーでも煽り自体は珍しくありませんが閉鎖環境で多人数から一人に対して悪意を向けられる、というのはまた格別に胸糞悪いです。
VCPT対策が正式に実装されるまで新規は避けた方が良いかと。これが理由でこのゲームをやめた人も相当います。

補足：「残業」と呼ばれるマナー違反について
このゲームは「生存者が全員脱出、または死亡する」の条件を満たさない限り永久に終わりません。言い換えれば一人でも目的放棄して手掛かりがないかくれんぼに徹されると殺人者はゲームを終える事がほぼ不可能になります。これを俗に「残業」と言います。残業の目的は小銭稼ぎから純粋な嫌がらせまで有りますが、戦績が芳しくないnoobキラーはゲート開放後に付き合わされる事が往々にあります。
一応、録画して遅延行為として通報すればアク禁されるかもしれませんがゲーム仕様レベルで時間制限を掛けて不可能にしないのは何ででしょうかね…今から始める人は救助目的以外でゲート開放後に居残る行為はやめてください。

Great Game 10/10

Its a amazing game, even when queued solo, the community is great (from what i've seen, there have been almost no "Toxic" players)  and I've had many killers who gave pity on people who had disconnected teamates. This game is even better when played with friends, from hearing them scream or just working together to survive the killer and escape. The queues for survivor is instant, but be warned, killer queues can take around 5-10 minutes depending on the time of day. Either way, I love this game and reccomend it to everyone.
Jogo muito bom... gostei muito... só a única coisa que me incomoda um pouco é a demora para jogar de killer... fora isso o jogo ta de parabens

Apro dicendo che io il gioco, lo ho consigliato anche a tutti i miei amici perchè é molto bello.
Io non ho moltissime ore di gioco ed incredibilmente attualmente gioco SOLO survivor e pensate un po, non aspetto manco mezzo minuto per entrare in gioco!!!!!!!!! Come?!?!? Incredibile?!?!?! bhè, avete ragione se avete letto i commenti precedenti al mio sembra incredibile, ma non è così se avete giocato al gioco. Attualmente il gioco (specialmente con l'evento di halloween) favorisce i killer, sopratutto dopo l'ultimo update che ha sconvolto un po le cose (io ho iniziato poco prima ed ho comunque avuto modo di toccare il cambio) e quindi il 70% dei player si è spostata verso il killer, tra loro anche quelli che, come detto da altri prima di me, giocano killer per sentirsi PRO e Fieri nel vincere facile consapevoli che prima o poi il killer ti prende per forza, per questo mi auguro che un giorno implementino un sistema che preveda un tempo limite al "tunnelling" impedendo di fatto ai killer di focalizzarsi su un singolo survivor per dei minuti e su questo gli sviluppatori hanno da lavorare. Ora aldilà degli arraffisti vari e dagli sfigati che vogliono vincere facile perchè altrimenti piangono o si fanno la cacchina addosso quando inseguiti dalla streghetta, il gioco è FIEROH, quando trolli il killer godi, quando scappi godi, quado sei inseguito e lo fai manzo godi ed è vero, attualmente è più difficile fare il survivor e io sono scarso, quindi quando riesco a fregare il killer godo il doppio!!! Questo per dire? che è difficile ma si può ancora fare, i killer sono op, i survivor devono sopravvivere. Se sei una principessa passa oltre, se sei un rosikone fatti due ore di coda alle poste così ti passa e capisci che è un gioco. P.s il gioco stimola un linguaggio scurrile e blasfemo. Mentre per i discorsi dei server dedicati, basta non mettere ready, controllare il ping del killer e poi startare se il killer ha un ping stabile decente (40~100ms), generalmente le mie partite scorrono lisce lisce.
Quindi si lo consiglio, anche se come in tutti i giochi ha i suoi problemi però non sto qui ad annoiarvi dicendovi come io vorrei che il gioco fosse. Vi consiglio solo di prenderlo, se deciderete di giocarci con la dovuta calma perchè essendo un gioco guardia e ladri, causa molto stress. Prendersela con il player che muove il killer per aver fatto qualcosa prevista dal gioco è da cerebralmente lesi, prendersela con i survivor perchè "gen rushano" è da lesi, sono gli sviluppatori che devono notare e risolvere i problemi, sia tecnici che di gameplay, noi dobbiamo giocare e reportare. Usare comunque le recensioni di steam per scaricare la propria frustrazione perchè si vuole vincere facile è incommentabile. Siete molto odorosi :D
P.S. Rileggere 2 volte prima di commentare :D

I really enjoy playing this game because it's really fun and can be distracting. You can either work your way to buying the characters from in-game currency earned from playing and leveling up, or you could just by it with real money. It takes a while to get better and I recommend watching people playing this game (i.e. Puppers, Noob3, Monto, or Ashlie9596) to learn the jist of it and if you like what you see you can buy it! 
Sounding like a robot now, but I generally like this game and I got my other friend obsessed with it. I think they did a /pretty good job so far/ and hope they keep it up.

非常推薦給喜歡玩恐怖遊戲的人
我幾個月玩下來 覺得遊戲大概跟麥爾斯一樣分為三階段

第一階段時像個純正的恐怖遊戲
當還是新手時會被音樂和心跳所嚇
搞不懂該怎麼跑 修發電機又一直爆
然而這卻是體驗氣氛最好的時候
但也可能因為對遊戲還陌生 
一直被巫妖嚇 一直被麥爾斯盯 又覺得夢魔怎麼那麼強
當人狂死 當鬼殺不到人
但不要緊 看看攻略實況 很快就會好起來

第二階段時像個競技遊戲
搞懂規則後便會為了Rank和血點認真玩
學著記住每張圖發電機 圖騰 寶箱等位置
並嘗試各種不同的技能和打法
不斷磨練自己的技術就為了勝利
並達到最高R1的人皇和鬼王

第三階段時反而像是個休閒趣味遊戲
遺憾的是這個遊戲不管人還是鬼到達Rank 1 都沒有實質獎勵
因此到達顛峰後很容易覺得一場空
但卻反而容易更放鬆玩
你會嘗試各種更新鮮的打法
甚至特地去溜鬼
這個時候第一階段的恐怖氣氛已經蕩然無存
而你可能也已經開不在乎輸贏
好玩最重要
下班下課時回來可以玩上一把
可能一個人玩 可能和朋友一起
這或許也是為什麼常常看到其他玩家遊戲時數好幾千的原因吧
對我來說這是比起現在當紅的大逃殺系列更令我享受的遊戲

Toxic game.

This game can be fun, but it has it's moments. I will recommend this game to people who love a 4v1 challenge, but if you dont like people who are toxic, have bad host connection, or just glitches in the game itself, then don't play.

How this game works:

Survivor:
You have 3 other teammates. Repair 5 generators to power 2 exit gates without being spotted. If you ARE spotted, run through pallets and vaulting areas to create distance from you and the killer. Once you open the exit gate, you now have the option to escape and win the match. If you are the last person and you've gotten 2 or more generators done, the hatch will spawn in a random location. Listen for the sound of the hatch and escape.

Killer:
Hook all 4 survivors on the hooks before they open the exit gates. Remember, hooks will break after somebody has died on that hook so be careful. Basement hooks do not break after somebody has died.
(There's not a whole lot to say about killer, hoenstly)
Anyway, in my opinion, this game needs work but it's still fun and very addicting to play. I DO recommend this to other players as long as you don't get salty easily.

The end.

So this game is unique, i'll give it that, it's unique in its content. However I'm giving a negative review because I feel like the games been out for too long and theres only one game mode and there's too many problems. It's fun with friends but the game itself gets very boring after so many hours.

За что выдали бан? Понятия и не имею. Было бы не жалко, если бы я действительно использовал читы и получил заслуженный бан, но я получил бан НИ ЗА ЧТО.

A good game for those who are fans of the horror genre. For those of you who want to experience the thrill and exhilaration of being the hunted; or the hunter, DBD has a satisfying gameplay loop that will satify both equally well. Its core elements can arguably be divided into two different games, and learning both sides (survivor/killer) is a fun and engaging experience in of itself.

Dieses Spiel ist eine Hassliebe, jenseits von Gut und Böse.
Es macht Spaß, wenn man mit Freunden auf dem Ts ist und den Killer mit Flashlight, Sabotage und Insta-Heals juked. Man muss nur auf die Gegenreaktion gefasst sein, wenn man als Folge dessen gefacecampt, gesluggt oder getunnelt wird. :D
Als Killer muss man damit rechnen, dass man sowieso immer alles falsch macht. Ob man nun campt oder völlig normal spielt, der after Chat ist immer ein Erlebnis für sich. Dead By Daylight hat nämlich eine liebreizende Community.

Alles in Allem finde ich es ist ein super Spiel für Muliplayer. Man erschreckt sich selbst nach 1000+ Stunden noch, wenn Michael Myers einen vom Gen grabt und durch die ständigen Patches wird es auch nicht langweilig.
-5 fps every single patch. gg.

Do you want to know what this game can do to you? Well read this. After playing this game, you will have the urge to kill yourself in real life and the urge to fck the killer who tunneled or camped you in real life and also having thoughs of destorying your pc. This game is indefinately a joke and playing it will cause mental health problems that haunts you and also this game is toxic. The saying 'Dont hate the player, hate the game' is not true, this game contains a lot of bugs that is annoying sometimes but not game breaking. However, that is not the problem. The problem is the community that is playing it. Killers will tunnel the shit out of you if you are the first to be hooked. Surviviors would farm you the moment you are on the hook. Pussy survivor will wet their pants when they see killers, all they do is hide and dont even dare to come out of the dark corner to complete the game objective. Bad manners is fcking possible in this game even though u cant speak in game, basically, a survivor teabags after stunning the killer. Some say its psychological warfare but after playing the game for awhile now, I think otherwise. I just dont get killers nowadays, they know its not fun when the killer camps or tunnels a survivor but they still do it. Some people play games to release stress, I suggest those people dont buy and play this game because u might end up having depression or even more serious mental issue. EQ doesnt apply in this game, no matter how strong you are mentally, this game will be fck you enough for you to might even taking your life. Only play this game with friends because public players are more likely to ruin the game for you then do you any good. To me, this game is a love, hate relationship because sometimes you might be lucky enough to queue up with good teammates or honourable opponents but some games are just bad and insulting. Currently, that is all I have to say about this toxic and painful game. I recommend those who are want to challenge yourself in this game, go ahead because the path ahead will lead you to your demise.

面白い！
ただ、回線抜きが多い。数日ゲームができなくなるくらいの罰を与えたほうがいいと思う。ほんと開幕抜かれるとなえる。サバイバー不利が多いゲーム性。
サバイバーが辛いのはまだ変わってない。「決死の一撃」復活させてほしい。担がれてからの移動できる時間ももっと短縮した方がいい。
ソロ専用の部屋を作るとキラーも増えそう。
デイリー以外にウィークリー＆シーズンごとにミッションを追加したり、スキンやポイントを配布すると定期的にプレーする頻度が増えそう。
さらなるDBDの進化に期待してます。

Pros:
+ Fun & interesting game mechanics
+ Killers are unique and interesting
+ Games usually takes < 20 minutes
+ Learning curve keeps you occupied
+ Interesting camera choices for Survivor vs Killer
+ Good tutorial to teach you the basics
+ Decent ranking system

Cons:
- Horrible lobby system feels like a chore. Especially with friends
- Some killers are extremely unbalanced (Nurse; the design of this killer goes against the core mechanic of survivor play)
- Some killers are extremely annoying to play against (Doctor; too many unnecessary mechanics)
- Camping and/or tunneling as a killer is a go-to strategy for normal games; which can be frustrating as a survivor
- Bloodpoints come too slow and feel too grindy

This game is fun. It can be fun. But I cannot recommend this game with some of the glaring issues (see cons) that could potentially be fixed. The lobby system makes this game with friends really unenjoyable. Killers tend to leave lobbies and then re-lobbying with friends can be so mind numbingly exhausting. Why don't the devs just assign a prelobby session ID to the users pre-join lobby? The game can simply do a check right after returning to menu and send you back to said lobby.

10/10 it will get abit boring after several 100 hours but then u just fuck shit up ingame or try bacme better at looping or set goals as i did example prestige a killer to prestige 3 or get all perks for surviver etc.

the game is a grinding game of its best. at events like this one there is now u even have to grind harder.

only bad thing i have to say about this game is that if u think u gonna play a lot of killer think twice the lobbyes for killers is so slow on average takes like 5-10 mins atleast before u get in a game.
Overall good horror game still dev need to fix the face camper.

Добротный авторский проект по хоррор тематике. Особенно доставляет играть ночью,  погружаясь в атмосферу ужаса, как будто сам попал в ужастик. Так же для разрядки обстановки и веселого времяпровождения можно и нужно играть с друзьми. Периодически игра пополняется свежим контентом и выпуском патчей, разрабы следят за технической составляющей игры и очень отзывчивы на поддержку своего детища, что добавляет им плюс в копилку кармы. У этой игры большое будущее и надеюсь её и дальше будут поддерживать. 
В общем всем любителям адреналина и крипи-вечеров настоятельно рекомендую к покупке, не пожалеете. Маст хэв, одназначно!

One of the best asymmetrical games out right now.

The gameplay is different everytime you play a new match. The base concept is the same, but with all players having different skill level, perks, items, powers, add-ons, etc. each game is slightly different. This makes the gameplay never dull.

With the new update system, new killer/survivor/map every 3 months, and updates inbetween these, the game has taken a turn for the better. New content and updates are rolling out all the time making the game more interesting and more worth playing. 

The specail events, especailly the Hallow Bright event for Halloween this year (2018) is pretty nice. After completeing certain task, cosmetric pieces, normally only for purchase with real money, can now be earned in game, and you get to pick the cosmetic (unlike previous events).

All in all, this game is headed in the right direction. New content, updates, and events are making the game more interesting and fun to play even after 450+ hrs. I would definitely recomment picking this game up, especially during one of the 50% off sales where you could even pick up some of the DLCs. I highly recommend getting at least Leatherface. 

And remember, most killers/survivors can be purchases with in-game currency now (Oct. 2018) (obtained just from playing the game), with the exception of licensed ones such as Leatherface, Halloween (Michael Myers/Lorie Strode), A Nightmare on Elmstreet (Freddy Krueger/Quentin Smith)  and Saw (The Pig/David Tapp) Chapters.
